owl:Ontology.terms:description: The HDGI ontology aims to model the pose and/or movement of human upper limbs that are used to interact with devices (particularly with device affordances). It is mapped around gestures performed by human's upper limb region to interact with these affordances. While allowing these mapping the ontology is also developed to be used as a dictionary for manufacturers, designers and developer community to browse and locate commonly used gestures to command certain affordances, or/and to understand the connections and dynamics around it. This ontology is made accessible, flexible and extendable enabling device manufacturers, designers and users to incorporate new gestures and map the relations to corresponding affordances accordingly. The ontology is geared at mapping the ubiquitousness in gesture vocabularies by linking them appropriately and does not enforce designers and manufacturers to follow a standard.
owl:Ontology.terms:title: Human Device Gesture Interaction Ontology
owl:Ontology.rdfs:label: Human Device Gesture Interaction Ontology

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation from an Affordance to a Device describing an affordance of a device.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: affordedBy

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation from a Human to a User Context or from a Device to a Device Context.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasContext

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a Movement and a Duration describing the time duration of a movement.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasDuration

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A quaternion “q” can be defined as (q) = w + xi + yj + zk, where w, x, y, and z are all real numbers. The jComponent is the component of j which equals to y. In the equation 'j' is defined as √-1. With quaternions, i = j = k = √-1.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: iComponent

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment:
In an equation where quaternion (q) = w + xi + yj + zk, where w, x, y, and z are all real numbers j-component = y
In the equation 'i' is defined as sqrt(-1). With quaternions, i = j = k = sqrt(-1).
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: jComponent

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment:
In an equation where quaternion (q) = w + xi + yj + zk, where w, x, y, and z are all real numbers k-component = z
In the equation 'i' is defined as sqrt(-1). With quaternions, i = j = k = sqrt(-1).
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: kComponent

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Frame of reference or the initial center. Location of the (0,0,0) postion related to the given coordinates.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: originPoint

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Represents the amount of rotation which will occur about this axis defined by (i-component, j-component, k-component). Known as scalar component.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: wComponent

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: In a three-dimensional Cartesian coordinate system where coordinates of any point in space are determined by three real numbers: x, y, z, the xPosition is the value of the real number x. Known as abscissa or x-coordinate in mathematics.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: xPosition

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An actuatable Affordance of a Device. This is rdfs:subClassOf ssn:ActuatableProperty.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ActuatableAffordance
owl:Class.skos:example: TV is a Device that can change the state to “on” or “off”. This is a property of a TV which a human could act upon. Thus, ability to “turn on” is an ActuatableAffordance of a TV.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Affordance is a quality or characteristic of Devices that indicates the possible action a Human can take with it. This is rdfs:subClassOf ssn:Property.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Affordance

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: BodyPart is any part of HumanBody such as an Face, Leg etc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: BodyPart

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Context describes details of a situation.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Context

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Device denotes a piece of hardware or software which consists of sensors or actuators or both.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Device

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: DeviceContext describes the data that is specifically related to a Device in a certain Context that is Device specific data in a Context.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: DeviceContext

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: DeviceManufacturer is the company/vendor manufactures a Device.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: DeviceManufacturer

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Duration of a temporal extent expressed as a decimal number scaled by a temporal unit. This is an owl:equivalentClass time:Duration.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Duration

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Face is a BodyPart which represents the front side of a Head.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Face

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: FacialGesture is a Gesture executed with a Movement or a Pose using the BodayPart Face.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: FacialGesture

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Finger is a BodyPart of the HumanBody. Also know as Digits of hand. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma9666.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Finger
Foot
owl:Class.rdfs:seeAlso: Foot is a BodyPart. It is the terminal segmant of lower limb. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma9664.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: FootGesture is a Gesture executed with a Movement or a Pose using the BodayPart Foot.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: FootGesture

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Forearm is a BodyPart. It is the region of the upper limb between the elbow and the wrist. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma9663.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Forearm

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: ForearmGesture is a Gesture executed with a Movement or a Pose using the BodyPart Forearm.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ForearmGesture

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Gesture is a Movement or a Pose of a BodyPart.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Gesture

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Hand is a BodyPart. It is the terminal segmant of upper limb which starts at end of the Forearm and consists of Fingers. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma9712.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Hand

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: HandGesture is a Gesture executed with a Movement or a Pose using the BodayParts Hand, Palm and/or Fingers.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: HandGesture

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Head is a BodyPart. It is the upper part of the HumanBody which starts from the upper end of the neck. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma7154.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Head

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: HeadGesture is a Gesture executed with a Movement or a Pose using the BodayPart Head.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: HeadGesture

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: User who perform a gesture
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Human

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: HumanBody holds a collection of BodyParts of a Human.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: HumanBody

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: IndexFinger is the second Finger on Hand. Also known as second Digit of hand. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma24946.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: IndexFinger

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: LeftForearm is the region of the left upper limb between the left elbow and the left wrist. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma11346.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: LeftForearm

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: LeftHand is the terminal segmant of left upper limb which starts at end of the LeftForearm and consists of Fingers. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma9714.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: LeftHand

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: LeftIndexFinger is the IndexFinger on the LeftHand. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma60334.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: LeftIndexFinger

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: LeftLittleFinger is the LittleFinger on LeftHand. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma60328.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: LeftLittleFinger

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: LeftMiddleFinger is the MiddleFinger on LeftHand. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma60332.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: LeftMiddleFinger

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: LeftPalm is the area located at the end of the LeftForearm (starting from left wrist) up until the start of a LeftHand Fingers which is the central region of the anterior part of the LeftHand. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma61071.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: LeftPalm

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: LeftRingFinger is the RingFinger on LeftHand. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma60330.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: LeftRingFinger

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: LeftThumb is the Thumb on LeftHand. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma60326.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: LeftThumb

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: LeftUpperArm is the region of the left upper limb between the left shoulder and left elbow joint. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma24896.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: LeftUpperArm

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Leg is a BodyPart and it is the intermediate segment of lower limb. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma24979.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Leg

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: LegGesture is a Gesture executed with a Movement or a Pose using the BodayPart Leg.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: LegGesture

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: LittleFinger is the fifth Finger on Hand. Also known as fifth Digit of hand. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma24949.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: LittleFinger

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The local coordinate system is the coordinate system that is convenient for a given entity (Finger, palm etc.), local space, or object space.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: LocalCoordinateSystem

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: MiddleFinger is the third Finger on Hand. Also known as third Digit of hand. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma24947.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: MiddleFinger

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The act of moving a certain body part towards a certain direction.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Movement

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An observable Affordance of a Device. This is rdfs:subClassOf ssn:ObservableProperty.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ObservableAffordance
owl:Class.skos:example: Thermostat is a Device that can sense/measure a temperature of a certain location at a given point of time and display it. Thus, “display measured temperature” is an ObservableAffordance of a thermostat.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Palm is a BodyPart. It is the area located at the end of the Forearm (starting from wrist) up until the start of a Finger which is the central region of the anterior part of the Hand. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma24920.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Palm

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Movement of palm. Either right or left.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: PalmMovement

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Position of a pose in a particular time
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Position

owl:Class.rdfs:comment:
A quaternion is defined as q = w + xi + yj + zk where w, x, y, and z are real numbers and i is defined as square root of -1. With quaternions, i = j = k = square root of -1.
The magnitude of a quaternion is calculated by magnitude = square root of (w2 + x2 + y2 + z2). For the unit quaternions, the magnitude is one.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Quaternion

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: RightForearm is the region of the right upper limb between the right elbow and the right wrist. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma11345.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: RightForearm

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: RightHand is the terminal segmant of right upper limb which starts at end of the RightForearm and consists of Fingers. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma9713.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: RightHand

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: RightIndexFinger is the IndexFinger on the RightHand. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma60333.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: RightIndexFinger

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: RightLittleFinger is the LittleFinger on RightHand. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma60327.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: RightLittleFinger

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: RightMiddleFinger is the MiddleFinger on RightHand. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma60331.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: RightMiddleFinger

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: RightPalm is the area located at the end of the RightForearm (starting from right wrist) up until the start of a RightHand Fingers which is the central region of the anterior part of the RightHand. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma61070.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: RightPalm

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: RightRingFinger is the RingFinger on RightHand. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma60329.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: RightRingFinger

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: RightThumb is the Thumb on RightHand. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma60325.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: RightThumb

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: RightUpperArm is the region of the right upper limb between the right shoulder and right elbow joint. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma24895.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: RightUpperArm

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: RingFinger is the fourth Finger on Hand. Also known as fourth Digit of hand. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma24948.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: RingFinger

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Rotation of a pose.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Rotation

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Thumb is the first Finger on Hand. Also known as first Digit of hand. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma24938.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Thumb

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Defines units of measurement. This is an equivalent class to qudt:Unit
owl:Class.rdfs:label: UnitOfMeasure

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: UpperArm is a BodyPart. It is the region of the upper limb between the shoulder and elbow joint. This is an owl:equivalentClass fma:fma24890.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: UpperArm

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: UpperArmGesture is a Gesture executed with a Movement or a Pose using the BodayPart UpperArm.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: UpperArmGesture

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: UserContext describes the data that is specifically related to a Human in a certain Context that is Human specific data in a Context.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: UserContext
